vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "CErc20Delegator::_setImplementation: Caller must be admin");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.value == 0,"CErc20Delegator:fallback: cannot send value to fallback");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(accrualBlockNumber == 0 && borrowIndex == 0, "market may only be initialized once");
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "CErc20Delegator::_setImplementation: Caller must be admin");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.value == 0,"CErc20Delegator:fallback: cannot send value to fallback");

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
CErc20Delegator.delegateTo (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#813-821) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success,returnData) = callee.delegatecall(data) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#814)

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
CErc20Delegator.delegateAndReturn (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#863-874) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success) = implementation.delegatecall(msg.data) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#864)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
CErc20Storage.underlying (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#354) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getCashOf (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3402-3406)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
CErc20DelegatorCertora.otherToken (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3370-3372) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOfInOther (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3386-3390)
	- borrowBalanceStoredInOther (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3390-3394)
	- exchangeRateStoredInOther (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3394-3398)
	- getCashInOther (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3398-3402)
	- getCashOfInOther (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3406-3410)
	- totalSupplyInOther (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3410-3414)
	- totalBorrowsInOther (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3414-3418)
	- totalReservesInOther (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3418-3422)
	- underlyingInOther (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3422-3426)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: CErc20Delegator.delegateToViewImplementation (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#840-848) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: CErc20Delegator.delegateToViewAndReturn (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#850-861) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#1611-1673) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#1637)
	-transferFrom (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#1651)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._addReservesInternal (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2894-2906):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2895-2896)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2902-2903)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._reduceReserves (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2957-2967):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2958-2959)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2964-2965)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setComptroller (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2826-2845):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2834-2835)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2837-2838)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CErc20Delegator._setImplementation (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#470-483):
	External calls:
	- delegateToImplementation(abi.encodeWithSignature(_resignImplementation())) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#474)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- implementation (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#478)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModel (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3022-3032):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3023-3024)
	- _setInterestRateModelFresh(newInterestRateModel) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3029-3030)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3029-3030)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModelFresh (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3038-3068):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newInterestRateModel.isInterestRateModel(),marker method returned false) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3057-3059)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3060-3062)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setReserveFactor (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2850-2860):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2851-2852)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reserveFactorMantissa (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2857-2858)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.accrueInterest (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2058-2136):
	External calls:
	- borrowRateMantissa = interestRateModel.getBorrowRate(cashPrior,borrowsPrior,reservesPrior) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2075)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2127)
	- borrowIndex (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2128)
	- totalBorrows (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2129)
	- totalReserves (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2130)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.borrowInternal (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2388-2396):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2389)
	- borrowFresh(msg.sender,borrowAmount) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2395)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2395)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CErc20Delegator.constructor (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#434-462):
	External calls:
	- delegateTo(implementation_,abi.encodeWithSignature(initialize(address,address,address,uint256,string,string,uint8),underlying_,comptroller_,interestRateModel_,initialExchangeRateMantissa_,name_,symbol_,decimals_)) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#448-455)
	- _setImplementation(implementation_,false,becomeImplementationData) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#458)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- admin (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#461)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CErc20Immutable.constructor (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3324-3343):
	External calls:
	- initialize(underlying_,comptroller_,interestRateModel_,initialExchangeRateMantissa_,name_,symbol_,decimals_) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3336-3338)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- admin (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#3339-3340)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.initialize (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#1700-1731):
	External calls:
	- err = _setComptroller(comptroller_) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#1714)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#1718)
	- borrowIndex (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#1719)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.liquidateBorrowInternal (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2600-2615):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2601)
	- error = cTokenCollateral.accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2607)
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,cTokenCollateral) (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2614)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (CErc20DelegatorCertora.sol#2614)
